title: Over the Andes in Ecuador
creator_credit: Public Media and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: The major difficulties restricting Ecuador’s development are illustrated by the journey of a crate to a tiny village in the Amazon Basin. Also shows the standard of living, and the differences between the cities of Guayaquil and Quito. (Edited version of an Institut fur Film und Bild, Munich film.)
